$< # Define global variable global strparam, module_name
####### Function params ########## strparam = '' params = $3.split(',') # Generate documentation array for par in params: strparam = strparam + ' * @param ' + par.strip() + '\n * Description of param ' + par.strip() + '\n'
####### Module name ########## # Check if current file is empty if $GEDIT_BASENAME != '' : # extract fil name (no extension) module_name = $GEDIT_BASENAME.split('.')[0].lower() else: # Default module name module_name = 'mymodule'
>/** ${10:Short description of this function}. * * ${11:Long description of this function.} * * Example usage: * @code * ${12:my_print('Function usage sample');} * @endcode * $<[3]: return strparam > * * @return * ${15:Description of return value} */ function _$< return module_name >_${2:function_name}(${3:$param1, $param2, $param3}) { ${0:#code} }
